attributes.action: Introduction of health warnings on all alcohol products.
attributes.additional_details:
Alcohol is taking a tragic toll on British health, with the number of drink-related deaths up by a third since the mid-1980s.
Excessive drinking is now implicated in 33,000 deaths a year, according to a report launched yesterday.
Alcohol misuse is costing the NHS up to £3billion a year, with more than 28,000 hospital admissions caused by alcohol dependence or poisoning.
attributes.background: Alcohol is taking a tragic toll on British health, with the number of drink-related deaths up by a third since the mid-1980s.
